components.name: User/Admin UI Component
components.description: The user interface component that interacts with the user or admin.

components.name: API Function
components.description: Function that calls the appropriate API (userApi or adminApi) to fetch or send data.

components.name: axiosClient.js
components.description: A module that handles HTTP requests to the backend using Axios.

components.name: Backend
components.description: The server-side application that processes requests and returns data in JSON format.

components.name: Redux Slice
components.description: A part of the Redux state management that updates the application state based on the received data.
